paper_title: Geometric Dark Energy from Spin-Torsion Cosmology: A Comprehensive Framework with Observational Validation
author: Houston Golden

versions.title: Initial Draft
versions.description: Houston Golden's original theoretical framework laying out the Einstein-Cartan spin-torsion cosmology approach to dark energy. Introduced the core modified Friedmann equations with spin-torsion coupling, the bounce mechanism at Planck density, and the geometric dilution parameter. Initial observational predictions outlined.
key_changes: Core Einstein-Cartan-Holst (ECH) action derivation
Modified Friedmann equations with spin-torsion coupling
Bounce condition at critical density ~ρ_Planck
Geometric dilution parameter ξ introduced
Initial galaxy spin asymmetry predictions
Basic comparison with ΛCDM
versions.note: Pre-git version; original manuscript before systematic review

versions.title: Deep Research & Adversarial Review
versions.description: Comprehensive deep research phase. Galaxy spin asymmetry literature search found 9 supporting papers and 5 null results. NASA ADS pulled 70+ papers across 7 topic areas. Adversarial peer review conducted by 4 AI providers (Gemini 2.0, GPT-4o, Grok 3, Perplexity Sonar Pro) identifying 7 key weaknesses. Structured counter-arguments built. Contingency analysis addressing 'what if galaxy spin asymmetry is not real' completed.
key_changes: Galaxy spin literature review: 9 supporting papers (Shamir 2012-2024, Longo 2011, SDSS analyses)
Galaxy spin null results: 5 papers (Patel & Desmond 2024, Hayes et al. 2017, Iye & Sugai 1991, Land et al. 2008, Philcox & Ereza 2025)
NASA ADS deep research: 70+ papers across torsion cosmology, CMB parity, H₀ tension, S₈ tension, DESI, torsion bounds, spin-torsion bounce
Key finding: Liu et al. 2025 (EPJC) — EC torsion preferred over ΛCDM by AIC, S₈ tension resolved
Key finding: Philcox & Ereza 2025 — BOSS 4PCF parity signal drops from 2.9σ to 1.0σ with improved mocks

Adversarial review: 7 weaknesses identified (spin averaging, observational status, parameter constraints, novelty claims, cosmic birefringence interpretation, numerical stability, galaxy spin systematic effects)
Counter-arguments constructed for all 7 adversarial criticisms
Contingency framework: ECH survives even without galaxy spin evidence (CMB parity, DESI, H₀ tension remain)
Posted 5 research updates to Convex mission database
versions.note: Research updates posted to mission but not yet integrated into paper text. Paper integration pending.
